benchmark_details.name: CodeUpdateArena
benchmark_details.overview: CodeUpdateArena is a benchmark for knowledge editing in the code domain, consisting of synthetic API function updates paired with program synthesis examples that require the updated functionality.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the ability of LLMs to update their knowledge of API functions based on recent changes.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Certain APIs are difficult to test with the dataset synthesis framework.

data.source: Constructed using synthetic updates and examples generated by GPT-4.

methodology.calculation: UPass@k is computed by assessing the probability that a model's generated sample is correct given unit tests.
methodology.interpretation: Higher UPass@k indicates better knowledge editing capabilities.
methodology.validation: The benchmark was validated through manual inspection of generated examples.
